adrFormatAddress: 615 W 27th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Recently decided to upgrade my restaurant's setup and came across this gem of a restaurant supply store. The extensive collection made it a breeze to find the exact pieces I was looking for. Quick delivery and top-notch quality. The transformation of my kitchen was almost instant. A reliable source for anyone in the restaurant business.

text.text: Recently decided to upgrade my restaurant's setup and came across this gem of a restaurant supply store. The extensive collection made it a breeze to find the exact pieces I was looking for. Quick delivery and top-notch quality. The transformation of my kitchen was almost instant. originalText.text: Not Worth the Aggravation. Terrible Customer Service. I called them twice. The gentleman on the phone was rude and somehow found a way of being condescending when talking about buying Rotisserie. He kept interrupting me, was very short and in the end not helpful at all. Such a weird energy - like he is having a perpetual bad day and he is happy to share his misery with you. Call at your own risk.

originalText.text: Purchased a high-performance blender for my smoothie bar, and it has exceeded my expectations. The staff helped me choose the right model for my needs, and the result is smooth and consistent blends every time.

text.text: Purchased a high-performance blender for my smoothie bar, and it has exceeded my expectations. The staff helped me choose the right model for my needs, and the result is smooth and consistent blends every time.

originalText.text: So fast and easy! We were upgrading our old equipment and unexpectedly got an earlier ship date on the new stuff. Put in a quick call and they were there the next morning and paid us a good price.  highly recommend.

text.text: So fast and easy! We were upgrading our old equipment and unexpectedly got an earlier ship date on the new stuff. Put in a quick call and they were there the next morning and paid us a good price.  highly recommend.

originalText.text: Seamless transaction! The team at this business was friendly, knowledgeable, and offered us a great deal for our used restaurant equipment. If you're looking to sell, I can’t recommend anyone more highly.
